meanings.definition: In the year of; in the year.
meanings.sent1: Anno the big storm, many trees fell down.
meanings.sent2: The event happened anno the big celebration.
meanings.sent3: Anno the noisy parade, the cat ran away.
meanings.sent4: The flowers bloomed anno the warm sun.
meanings.sent5: Anno the dark night, the stars shone brightly.

meanings.definition: In the year of our Lord.
meanings.sent1: The anno celebration was joyful and festive.
meanings.sent2: She wore a beautiful dress to the anno party.
meanings.sent3: The anno cake was delicious and sweet.
meanings.sent4: His anno speech was inspiring and heartfelt.
meanings.sent5: The anno decorations were colorful and bright.
